com.almasb.fxgl.input

Class Input

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.fxgl.input.Input
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserProfileSavable

    public final class Input
extends Object
implements UserProfileSavable
    Provides access to mouse state and allows binding of actions to key and mouse events
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

      • mockKeyPress

        public void mockKeyPress(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode key,
                         InputModifier modifier)
        Mocks key press event. The behavior is equivalent to user pressing and holding the key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        modifier - key modifier

      • mockKeyRelease

        public void mockKeyRelease(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode key,
                           InputModifier modifier)
        Mocks key release event. The behavior is equivalent to user releasing the key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        modifier - key modifier

        Parameters:
        btn - mouse button
        modifier - mouse button modifier

      • setProcessActions

        public void setProcessActions(boolean b)
        Setting to false will not run any actions bound to key/mouse press. The events will still continue to be registered.
        Parameters:
        b - process actions flag

      • setRegisterInput

        public void setRegisterInput(boolean b)
        Set to false to disable registering any form of input.
        Parameters:
        b - register input flag

      • addInputMapping

        public void addInputMapping(InputMapping inputMapping)
        Add input mapping. The actual implementation needs to be specified by OnUserAction annotation.
        Parameters:
        inputMapping - the mapping

      • scanForUserActions

        public void scanForUserActions(Object instance)
        Given an object scans its methods for OnUserAction annotation and creates UserActions from its data.
        Parameters:
        instance - the class instance to scan

      • clearAllInput

        public void clearAllInput()
        Clears all input, that is releases all key presses and mouse clicks for a single frame

      • rebind

        public boolean rebind(UserAction action,
                      javafx.scene.input.KeyCode key)
        Rebinds an action to given key.
        Parameters:
        action - the user action
        key - the key to rebind to
        Returns:
        true if rebound, false if action not found or there is another action bound to key

      • rebind

                      javafx.scene.input.MouseButton btn)
        Rebinds an action to given mouse button.
        Parameters:
        action - the user action
        btn - the mouse button
        Returns:
        true if rebound, false if action not found or there is another action bound to mouse button
